sqlMap.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID AS "id", EMPLOYEE_FAMILY_NAME AS "familyName", EMPLOYEE_FIRST_NAME AS "firstName", EMPLOYEE_AGE AS "age" FROM EMPLOYEE ORDER BY CAST(EMPLOYEE_ID AS INTEGER)
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE2 (EMPLOYEE_ID, EMPLOYEE_FAMILY_NAME, EMPLOYEE_FIRST_NAME, EMPLOYEE_AGE ) VALUES( #id#, #familyName#, #firstName#, #age# )
